title: Blooded Greataxe

Blooded Greataxe Rare 3~17 Damage 1d12 +1 Slashing+1d4 Slashing (Conditional) Relentless Revenge: When the wielder has 50% Hit Points or less, they deal an additional 1~4 Slashing damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Stained brown and reeking of iron, this greataxe once belonged to a killer so deranged, his name was magically scrubbed from all histories.
